database.name: VIEW SSFI_PAYMENT_V
database.view: SELECT fpd.fin_payment_id, fp.documentno AS documento, fp.referenceno AS referencia, fp.paymentdate AS fecha_cp, fp.paymentdate AS fecha_contable, fp.isreceipt AS tipo_transaccion, sum(fpsd.amount) AS pago_cobro, fp.c_costcenter_id AS costcenter_id, fp.status AS estado, fps.c_invoice_id AS fin_payment_schedule_invoice FROM fin_payment_detail fpd JOIN fin_payment_scheduledetail fpsd ON fpd.fin_payment_detail_id = fpsd.fin_payment_detail_id JOIN fin_payment fp ON fp.fin_payment_id = fpd.fin_payment_id JOIN fin_payment_schedule fps ON fpsd.fin_payment_schedule_invoice = fps.fin_payment_schedule_id WHERE fpd.isprepayment = 'N' AND fpsd.fin_payment_schedule_invoice IS NOT NULL GROUP BY fpd.fin_payment_id, fp.documentno, fp.referenceno, fp.paymentdate, fp.isreceipt, fp.c_costcenter_id, fp.status, fps.c_invoice_id ORDER BY fpd.fin_payment_id
